remarks: Value of the addition operation in a binary structure product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsval.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsval.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsval.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsadd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
xpsadd.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Y ) $.
xpsadd.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
xpsadd.6 $e |- ( ph -> D e. Y ) $.
xpsadd.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .x. C ) e. X ) $.
xpsadd.8 $e |- ( ph -> ( B .X. D ) e. Y ) $.
xpsadd.m $e |- .x. = ( +g ` R ) $.
xpsadd.n $e |- .X. = ( +g ` S ) $.
xpsadd.p $e |- .xb = ( +g ` T ) $.
xpsadd $p |- ( ph -> ( <. A , B >. .xb <. C , D >. ) = <. ( A .x. C ) , ( B .X. D ) >. ) $.
